metadata.title: CVE-2021-20329 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - low
metadata.description: Specific cstrings input may not be properly validated in the MongoDB GoDriver when marshalling Go objects into BSON. A malicious user could use aGo object with specific string to potentially inject additional fields intomarshalled documents. This issue affects all MongoDB GO Drivers prior toand including 1.5.0.

criterions.comment: mongodb: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
